indian_opportunities.title: Microsoft Software Engineer Internship 2025
indian_opportunities.description: 10-12 week full-time internship for CS/Engineering students. Work on real software components, collaborate with global teams, and contribute to cutting-edge product development.

indian_opportunities.description: Summer internship in networking protocols, application software, or embedded systems development. Strong foundation in CS fundamentals required.

indian_opportunities.title: Amazon Software Development Engineer Internship

indian_opportunities.description: Free online internship with hands-on project exposure. Work on real-world business scenarios for Infosys clients. Self-paced modules.
